Key Match Events: The match was called off due to wet conditions in the outfield of Central Broward Park & Broward County Stadium, Florida after rains and flash floods.
India's confidence primarily stems from the pacers’ effort in three group matches. Lead quick Jasprit Bumrah, Arshdeep Singh, Hardik Pandya and Mohammed Siraj combined to bag 20 wickets among them.
Arshdeep Singh has delivered six overs during the powerplay phase of this T20 World Cup and has allowed only a single boundary.
Pre-Game Insights: The weather of Florida remains dicey and even though the rains have stopped, the threat over India vs Canada match continues.
India has already qualified for the Super 8 stage, while Canada is already out of the marquee tournament.

In contrast to New York, Florida's pitch is known for being favorable to batters. The toss-winning captain will look to bowl first on this pitch as having a target in mind to chase always helps in such conditions.
Like USA, this is the first time India and Canada are going against each other at the international level and IND will look forward to a strong start.

Ahead of his side's ICC T20 World Cup group stage game against Canada, Indian fielding coach T Dilip lauded wicketkeeper-batter Rishabh Pant for his performance since his return to international cricket after a life-threatening road accident back in late-2022.
Former pacer Sreesanth has some special praise in store for India T20 World Cup team vice captain Hardik Pandya, who continued to leave his mark in the USA with magical spells with the ball.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The USA vs Ireland T20 World Cup 2024 match was washed out due to wet conditions at the Central Broward Park & Broward County Stadium, which proved to be a major setback for Pakistan as they are eliminated from the T20 World Cup 2024.
The drainage system of Florida stadiums is not equipped to handle much rain.
